name: WigglerSim2022.exe
description:
Chrome started to break Wigglersim, so here is a backup bundled in Electron which has a stable version of Chrome. Should work with all standard WigglerSim features, including porting your save from the farrago website.  (that part WILL break if we ever do a dollslurp again). 

Works for windows.  I can't get it working on Mac since I don't have one (you need one to build).   If anyone wants to volunteer to get it building on mac you can find the source at: 

https://github.com/jadedResearcher/WigglerSimStandalon2022
